intro: Anomalosicyos fusiformis, commonly known as the elongated horned cactus, is a rare and unique species native to the arid regions of southern Africa. It is characterized by its long, slender, tubular stems that can grow up to several meters in length. The plant produces yellow flowers that bloom in the evening, attracting specific pollinators. Its leaves are modified into spines, reducing water loss in its harsh environment. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a vulnerable species.
